documents.title: Employee Benefits Overview
documents.content: Cloudora offers structured benefits including training support, fast growth paths, transparent incentives, performance-based rewards, and supportive guidance from Genie.

documents.title: 7-Day Trial Employee Benefits
documents.content: During the 7-day trial: employees receive full training, real-time Genie support, call scripts, daily tasks, XP rewards, job role clarity, and fair evaluation. Good performance leads to selection.

documents.title: Incentive Criteria (Universal)
documents.content: Incentives depend on: punctuality, CRM discipline, task completion, call quality, customer handling, teamwork, and behaviour. Genie tracks performance patterns to guide improvement.

documents.title: Post-Selection Employee Benefits
documents.content: Benefits after selection: stable salary, performance incentives, XP-based rewards, certificates, skill-growth training, career-progress roadmap, Genie-based daily coaching.
